akn:section.akn:heading: Report on misconduct allegations and grievances.

akn:content.akn:p: The number of individuals, of all rank and services, investigated and disciplined for misconduct, categorized by the nature of the misconduct allegations, the nature of those misconduct allegations that are substantiated, and the discipline given for substantiated allegations; and

The number of formal grievances filed by individuals, including complaints filed with each agencyâ€™s Equal Employment Opportunity Officer, categorized by the nature of the grievance filed and the nature of those grievances that are substantiated.
